Description: Ostracon, fragment of the rim-section (?) of a red pottery vessel, the fabric is relatively coarse and grey-black in section, the interior is lightly covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and remains of one line of incised Coptic text.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell & J. Faiers
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394352) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394352)
